Package: deploydb

[Groovy] Class ModelLoader<T>

    • deploydb.ModelLoader

    • Model Loader object It instantiates a model object from the yaml configuration.

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          ModelLoader (java.lang.Class<T> klass)
          Creates a new Model Registry for the given class.

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.String getIdent(java.lang.String filename)
          Get identifier for model from the the input file

          Instantiate a new Model object by parsing contents of the input file (T)
          T load(java.lang.String filename)
          Instantiate a new Model object by parsing contents of the input file (T)
          T loadFromString(java.lang.String content)
          Instantiate a new Model using configuration content.

        • T loadFromString(java.lang.String content)

          Instantiate a new Model using configuration content. We create a temp file and call load(filename)

          Parameters:
          Configuration - content
